adjectives.description: gratulate (comparative more gratulate, superlative most gratulate)

verbs.description: gratulate (third-person singular simple present gratulates, present participle gratulating, simple past and past participle gratulated)

entries.meaning: (archaic) To express joy at (an event or situation).

examples: […]  when a storm hath ceased, the birds regain / Their cheerfulness, and busily retrim / Their nests, or chant a gratulating hymn / To the blue ether and bespangled plain;
